name: Monk Blast
description:
Controls:

E/Mouse Button 1 = Attack

W/Space = Jump

A/Left = Move Left

D/Right = Move Right

P/Tab = Pause

F = Interact

A nearby forest has been overrun by demonic forces that are manipulating the very forces of nature. The monk must put a stop to it before the very fabric of reality is torn asunder.

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. The movement was a conscious decision based on the theme "Out Of Control" along with the plot that I wasn't really able to expand upon. I wish I had more time to work on it, but I am happy I managed to get as much as this done.

Even though the game is definitely rough around the edges, I hope you enjoy it. I made the code, art, and sound effects all by myself.
